title: Doomsday Algorithm
guide:
### Mental Day Calculation

Reduces the calendar to a single sum. Result: **0=Sunday, 1=Monday... 6=Saturday**.

#### 1. Centuries (Anchor)
| Century | Anchor | Value |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| 1900-1999 | Wednesday | **3** |
| 2000-2099 | Tuesday | **2** |
| 2100-2199 | Sunday | **0** |

#### 2. Months (Doomsdays)
These dates always land on the same weekday as the year's Doomsday:
| Month | Day (Common) | Day (Leap) |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **Jan** | 3 | **4** |
| **Feb** | 28 | **29** |
| **Mar** | 14 (Pi) | 14 |
| **Apr** | 4 (4/4) | 4 |
| **May** | 9 (9/5) | 9 |
| **Jun** | 6 (6/6) | 6 |
| **Jul** | 11 (7-11) | 11 |
| **Aug** | 8 (8/8) | 8 |
| **Sep** | 5 (9/5) | 5 |
| **Oct** | 10 (10/10)| 10 |
| **Nov** | 7 (7-11) | 7 |
| **Dec** | 12 (12/12)| 12 |

#### 3. Formula
`(Century + (Year + Year/4) + Day - MonthAnchor) % 7`
